physical_appearance:This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized foliage
 animals
 and three deity figures. The chakla is in the shape of a five-sided figure
 with a higher triangular top and square bottom.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized foliage, animals, and three deity figures. The chakla is in the shape of a five-sided figure, with a higher triangular top and square bottom.
